item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Switch to Hugo from now on

item.title: Unpredictable Future
item.description: 2017 was a bit weird since I had to involve to many things. Things started to be a mess and became unpredictable. Oh, a guy asked me: You can predict the future? So this is the answer: Yes (and hopefully you can read it here). My current situation: Working full time for a company, working partime with a good mate, preparing my own startup up and running in the end of this year while staying in a foreign country, under the rush of changing my nationality before next year.

item.title: Vim Tips
item.description: I have been using vim / vim shortcut for nearly everything (Intellij, tmux, chrome browser). These are several tips that I used for everyday ’s action ^ to jump to beginning of the line $ to jump to the end of the line dd to delete the line (use it too much and this makes the D on my mac keyboard is faded away already) w to jump forward to each word b to jump backward each word while saving a file, you can send the vim buffer as a parameter to a filter, which actually a bash command in order to execute.

item.title: A small project example : add yours !
About
item.description: A software engineer, was born and raised in Vietnam, but moved to Melbourne several years ago. I spend most of my time in front of computer to hack around all the latest technologies. As a result, I seldom know anything about the place I live ðŸ˜“. This habit should be changed somedays. My current favourite including react, react-native, node.js and java.
